Desc.entry: Provides a focal point for the community. Groups include keep fit for women, gardening, wine guild, drama and art group (see separate entry). Other groups include bridge, yoga, tai-chi (see separate entries), indoor bowling, swimming, rambling (see separate entry), badminton, choir (see separate entry), ballet, football, cricket and tennis. Resources include meeting rooms, function room, bar, disco facility and creche. Runs Hallam Pre-School 5 full mornings per week. A registered charity.
